questions.question: What does ProofPoint do?
choices: Creates professional-looking slideshows suitable for projections.
Email security/email filter to protect against advanced email threats.
Scans emails for mentions of key words to send them to the proper folder in Outlook.

choices: A messaging app for First Responders
A telecommunications service used primarily by Fire Departments
A nationwide cellular band dedicated to First Responders created after the 9/11 attacks
An internet service provider dedicated to Police Departments

What does MIL STD mean?
choices: Military Intelligence Log - Signal To Deploy.
A standardization system designed by the Military to test first response communications.
Man, I Love Some Tasty Doritos.
A rating that means the product meets established engineering and technical requirements for military use.
